name: Windows Update Error
description: Windows Update get some error Check if need a 0-days KB
query: (winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:/[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss][Uu][Pp][Dd][Aa][Tt][Ee][Cc][Ll][Ii][Ee][Nn][Tt]/ AND event.code:(16 OR 20 OR 24 OR 213 OR 217))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:Microsoft\-Windows\-WindowsUpdateClient AND event.code:(16 OR 20 OR 24 OR 213 OR 217))`
